檱字的基本解释

檱
qí
古同“棋”。

檱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《集韻》渠之切，平之，羣。］
亦作“棊1”。亦作“檱1”。亦作“櫀1”。亦作“簯1”。
(1)一种文娱活动的用具。一副棋包括若干颗棋子和一个棋盘，下棋的人按一定规则摆上并移动棋子，比赛输赢。如围棋、象棋、军棋、跳棋等。古时亦通称博弈的子为棋。
(2)指下棋。
[②]［jī］
［《集韻》居之切，平之，見。］
亦作“檱2”。亦作“櫀2”。
根柢。

檱字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檱； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页558第28
【類篇】【韻會】?與棋同。

檱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檱字的起名意思

暂无。

檱
Basic explanation of words
檱
qí
The ancient same "chess".
檱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Ji Yun" Qu Zhi Qi, Ping Zhi, Qun. ]
Also known as "棊1". Also known as "檱1". Also known as "櫀1". Also known as "Zhu 1".
(1) A tool for recreational activities. A chess set consists of a number of chess pieces and a chess board. The chess player places and moves the chess pieces according to certain rules, and the game wins or loses. Such as Go, Chess, Army Chess, Checkers, etc. In ancient times, the pieces of a game were also commonly referred to as chess.
(2) Refers to playing chess.
[②]［jī］
["Jiyun" Juzhi, Pingzhi, see. ]
Also known as "檱2". Also known as "櫀2".
Root.
檱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檱; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 558 28
[Classes] [Rhyme Club]? Same as chess.
